note.p: Daughter of Andrew Wedderburn Colvile (or Colville) of Ochiltree, Ayrshire, and Craigflower, Torryburn, Fife. Married Samuel Marindin at St Marylebone, Middlesex, in 1834.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1931/439/2)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 May 2022)
ODNB s.v. Marindin, Sir Francis Arthur
